title: Child Injured in Fall Off Balcony in Laurel
body: File photoA child is seriously hurt after falling from a balcony in Laurel, officials say. The child reportedly fell about 12 feet off a balcony in the 8800 block of Hunting Lane, the Prince George’s County fire department said. Crews were dispatched to the address at about 12:45 p.m. The child was unresponsive and was rushed to a trauma center with life-threatening injuries, the fire department said.
